int arr1[10];
int arr2[10];
int i;

i = 0;

while(i <= 9) {
    arr1[i] = i;
    arr2[i] = i*i;
    i = i + 1;
}

i = 0;
while(i <= 9) {
    print arr1[i];
    i = i + 1;
}

i = 0;
while(i <= 9) {
    print arr2[i];
    i = i + 1;
}

i = 0;
while(i <= 9) {
    print arr2[i]/arr1[i];
    i = i + 1;
}

i = 0;
while(i <= 9) {
    print arr2[i]-arr1[i];
    i = i + 1;
}

/*
Expected output:
0000000000
0000000001
0000000002
0000000003
0000000004
0000000005
0000000006
0000000007
0000000008
0000000009
0000000000
0000000001
0000000004
0000000009
0000000016
0000000025
0000000036
0000000049
0000000064
0000000081
0000000000
0000000001
0000000002
0000000003
0000000004
0000000005
0000000006
0000000007
0000000008
0000000009
0000000000
0000000000
0000000002
0000000006
0000000012
0000000020
0000000030
0000000042
0000000056
0000000072
*/
